00062 // =============================================================================
00063 // get a value for a number of samples into the future?
00064 // sampleTime is a integer count into the future, that may repeat
00065 void Generator :: getBlock(long sampleTime, double outputSamples[])
00066 {
00067     // simulate: create an array 
00068         // double outputSamples[this->blockSize]; 
00069         long numSamplesToProcess = outputModel->getBlockSize();
00070 
00071         //while(numSamplesToProcess--)
00072     //while (--numSamples >= 0)
00073     for (int i=0; i<numSamplesToProcess; i++)
00074     {
00075         outputSamples[i] = getValueAtSample(sampleTime + i);
00076     }
00077 
00078     // return denorm(rng(), min, max);
00079 }

00086 
00087 void Generator :: printSample(int n, double t, TimeContext tc)
00088 {
00089     //std::cout << "calling printSample from within Generator: " << this->getName() << std::endl;
00090 
00091     std::vector<double> values; // store values
00092     for (int i=0; i<n; i++) { 
00093         switch (tc) {                       
00094             case timeContextNameSample:       
00095                 values.push_back(getValueAtSample(t+i)); // adds to stream
00096                 break;              
00097             case timeContextNameSecond:                         
00098                 values.push_back(getValueAtSecond(t+i)); // adds to stream
00099                 break;              
00100         }; // end case    
00101     };
00102     printVector(values, this->getName());
00103 }
